channel.title: How can I reset a stat back to 1[delta]
channel.description:
I know this sounds stupid, but I tried; for example: playerLevel[3] = 1; but it didn't work. What can I use to reset it? (I know how to use just need to know the methode)
[Don't come up with noob talk like "go to character files and change it there"]

item.title: How can I reset a stat back to 1[delta]
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Are you guys fucking blind? He said not to tell him that.

smkscape:

[Don’t come up with noob talk like “go to character files and change it there”]

I just don’t get it. If you read the first part and saw what he wanted, then why wouldn’t you have read the second part?

Read full topic

item.title: How can I reset a stat back to 1[delta]
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Classic Rune Classic
item.description:
@Rune_Classic wrote:

Just go into the character file and change stats and save. (But you have to be logged out for this to work)

Read full topic
item.source: How can I reset a stat back to 1[delta]

item.title: How can I reset a stat back to 1[delta]
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

What you said is what i am about to say. Log out, change the stats and save. and log back in. if you don’t log out and you have lets say 99 level, it will remain 99 until you log out and change.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I reset a stat back to 1[delta]

item.title: How can I reset a stat back to 1[delta]
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“setxp”) && playerRights >= 3) {
int stat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6, 8));
int xp = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9));
int oldLevel = getLevelForXP(playerXP[stat]);

            playerXP[stat] = xp;
            playerLevel[stat] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[stat]);
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            setSkillLevel(stat, playerLevel[stat], playerXP[stat]);
            if (stat == 02) {
                CalculateMaxHit();
            }[/code]

Have fun.

Read full topic
